ModMetaData.name: Food Bowl
ModMetaData.author: Programmer Lily
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a Food Bowl - a single-stack storage building specifically designed for pet foods and animal feed. Perfect for organizing your colony's animal care station!
Features: - Single-stack storage (holds one stack per bowl) - Prevents food deterioration - Optimized for pet foods: Hay, Kibble, Milk, Berries, etc. - Excludes human meals (keeps pet food separate) - Hidden storage (food is stored but not visually displayed) - Cheap to build (only 8 materials vs 20 for shelf) - Compact 1x1 footprint - Multiple material options (Wood, Steel, Stone) - Found in Furniture category - No research required
Great for pet feeding stations, animal farms, and keeping your hay and kibble organized!
